name: Acadia Healthcare Company, Inc.
description: Acadia Healthcare Company, Inc. is a leading provider of behavioral healthcare services in the United States. Founded in 2005, Acadia is dedicated to delivering high-quality, patient-centered care across a wide range of mental health and substance use disorder treatment services. With a network of over 200 facilities, including inpatient psychiatric hospitals, residential treatment centers, and outpatient clinics, Acadia serves a diverse population of individuals and families in need of support. The company focuses on evidence-based treatment approaches and innovative care models, emphasizing the importance of comprehensive, individualized treatment plans. Acadia's mission is to provide compassionate care that transforms lives by addressing the psychological, emotional, and social well-being of its patients. The company is committed to improving community access to behavioral health services and reducing stigma associated with mental health issues. Acadia actively partners with healthcare providers, payers, and community organizations to enhance service delivery and outcomes for its patients. As a publicly traded company, Acadia is also focused on corporate responsibility and sustainability, ensuring that its operations align with best practices in ethical governance and community engagement.
